column3: I don't think this is entirely useful considering that this test will be removed (hopefully soon) altogether by #13307.

> I don't think this is entirely useful considering that this test will be removed (hopefully soon) altogether by #13307. \n\nOn the other hand this change is pretty straightforward, and might make sense until #13307 is merged.
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->No more conflicts as of last run.
It's months later and #13307 is still in state of flux. I'm going ahead and merging this.\n

:tada: Congratz on halving the total memory usage of `make check` as well:

https://bitcoinperf.com/timeline/?exe=3%2C4%2C2%2C1&base=1%2B23&ben=makecheck.clang.3.mem-usage&env=1&revs=10&equid=on&quarts=on&extr=on
